name: Necrogun
description:
Overview
An arcade style game where you have to survive as long as you can and gain as many points as you can! Every 5 enemies you kill, one of them will rise from the dead and fight for you! (Make sure your helpers don't shoot you). Be careful though, the undead love action and if they don't get any they'll have to make their own by shooting at you! More action means more points in this game, but more action comes with its risks.

Point System
Points are awarded on each kill multiplied by the numbers of enemies on screen with the number of seconds you've been playing for added on to the score. If your undead helpers get angry, it's triple points and your helpers are now enemies!

Anger System
Anger slowly accumulates over time and a LOT of anger accumulates if you try to shoot your helpers (why wouldn't they be angry?). Reduce anger by killing enemies!

Extra Notes
Your helpers are undead so they're not alive. Please don't try to kill them :).
I only made this for Windows. I know Mac doesn't work and Linux might not either sorry. ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

Developer Message
This is my first ever GameJam so I didn't have any premade assets or music or anything, everything was made from scratch. I hope you enjoy!

Also tell me your high scores!

Controls
WASD to move
Mouse to aim
Left Click / Space to shoot
